Language.name: en
Language.Text:
Day Seven.
Today we had to admit to ourselves that we are unable to turn back at this point. We feel more and more that the Labyrinth is toying with us. It is full of mystery and indications. Every time we start to feel that we are close to a discovery, we encounter another mystery, another maze.
Ice city was empty. I still have goose bumps, when I recall Ripley melting in a puddle of slime. Yuck. However, she survived and her new appearance seems to suit her well. She now has abilities that come in handy in the maze.
Each character has unique abilities. They behave differently on ice, in water, when pushing objects. Try it out.
